text: Oleksiy Oleksiyovych Hetman (; born 16 August 1975) is a Ukrainian football coach and a former player. He works as an assistant manager with the U-21 team of FC Illichivets Mariupol. Hetman played for FC Zhemchuzhina Sochi in the 2000 Russian First Division.http://www.rsssf.com/tablesr/rus00.html He is the younger brother of Yuriy Hetman. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1975 births Category:People from Luhansk Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Dynamo Luhansk players Category:FC Mariupol players Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:FC Ordabasy players Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Kazakhstan Category:FC Zhemchuzhina Sochi players Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:FC Rostov players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC SKA Rostov-on-Don players Category:FC Volgar Astrakhan players Category:FC Zorya Luhansk players Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:Association football defenders
title: Oleksiy Hetman
